text: Android - Ul Layouts ﬁ * View is an object from the View class and occupies a rectangular area on the screen. It performs drawing and event handling. * View is the base class for widget (buttons, text fields, etc.) * AViewGroup is a subclass View that behaves like a container for more Views or other ViewGroups. * Layouts which are subclasses of ViewGroup class * Layouts are declared using the XML file main_layout.xml located in “res/layout ” .
